profile.name: ISO 19005-3:2012 - 6.8 Embedded files - AFRelationship
profile.description: In order to enable identification of the relationship between the file specification dictionary and the content that is referring to it, a new (required) key has been defined and its presence (in the dictionary) is required.
profile.creator: veraPDF Consortium

rule.description: In order to enable identification of the relationship between the file specification dictionary and the content that is referring to it, a new (required) key has been defined and its presence (in the dictionary) is required.

error.message: The file specification dictionary for an embedded file does not contain the AFRelationship key
